title: Facebook Logo Font
content:
Does anyone recognize this type? Seems like there is an obvious answer here.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [facebook.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120622232354/http:/typophile.com/files/facebook.jpg) | 10.73 KB |
author: Sam Serif

comments.content: Very cool. How did you come across that?
[Cuban Council](http://web.archive.org/web/20120622232354/http:/www.cubancouncil.com/), who did their identity, have the info on their site.

Akira is right. Kral made some judicious modifications, but there's no reason to believe he didn't start with [Klavika Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20120622232354/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/process/klavika_bold_ot/?sample_text=facebook&sample_size=74&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
What is the font used in the body text? It's not Helvetica. Or is it? Is it Arial?
